name: Lazer Elephant
description:
Lazer Elephant is a sythnwave fuelled DeLorean hellride through the neon landscape of the omniscient laser shooting elephant head tower. Soak in the gritty ambience of this endlessly difficult, retro styled action game, where although difficult, approaching the elephant in the room is the only way to progress.

Developed at #SUNJAM 2017, the Sunshine Coast game jam.

Verny Grieger - Firefingers - Musician & Audio Engineering
Joseph Hodges - Hodges Studios - Programming, Developing, Visual Effects, Project Management
Paloma Hodgins - Graphic Design, Iconography
Tom Knowles - Lead Programming, Lead Unity Development
Dean Simonds - Game Design, UI & UX Design, Video Editing, Project Management
Graeme Smyth - 3D Art and Animation
